name: Hugmynd
description:
A two-player arena battle where you fight for the control over the character.

This is a 2 player game!

Player 1 starts with the keyboard, while player 2 starts with the mouse.
Player 1 has to get the ball into the other players goal, while maintaining control by grabbing control pills. Use (WASD) to move around and (Space) to kick the ball.

If the player is out of control, the controls switch. So make sure to switch around the mouse and keyboard too!
Player 2 can make it hard for the other player to maintain control, by (left click) to build Canons or (right click) to build a wall.
